targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
Where AlarmStatus = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
			Where NOT AlarmStatus = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
Where AlarmStatus = 3
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
  COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.MsgSource with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  RecordStatus = 1 AND Name NOT LIKE 'AI Engine%'

select datename(dw,AlarmDate) as Day,AlarmDate, (ISNULL(New,0)+ISNULL(OpenAlarm,0)+ISNULL(Working,0)+ISNULL(Escalated,0)+ISNULL(AutoClosed,0)+ISNULL(FalsePositive,0)+ISNULL(Resolved,0)+ISNULL(UnResolved,0)+ISNULL(Reported,0)+ISNULL(Monitor,0)) as Total,
(ISNULL(AutoClosed,0)+ISNULL(FalsePositive,0)+ISNULL(Resolved,0)+ISNULL(UnResolved,0)+ISNULL(Reported,0)+ISNULL(Monitor,0)) as Closed
from
(
select CONVERT(date, AlarmDate) as AlarmDate,count(AlarmName.Name) as AlarmCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case
When AlarmStatus = 0 Then 'New'
When AlarmStatus = 1 Then 'OpenAlarm'
When AlarmStatus = 2 Then 'Working'
When AlarmStatus = 3 Then 'Escalated'
When AlarmStatus = 4 Then 'AutoClosed'
When AlarmStatus = 5 Then 'FalsePositive'
When AlarmStatus = 6 Then 'Resolved'
When AlarmStatus = 7 Then 'UnResolved'
When AlarmStatus = 8 Then 'Reported'
When AlarmStatus = 9 Then 'Monitor' End)) as AlarmStatus
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] as Alarm join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule as AlarmName on Alarm.AlarmRuleID=AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
where
Alarm.AlarmDate BETWEEN getdate()-7 AND getdate()
group by AlarmDate,AlarmStatus
) d
pivot
(
sum(AlarmCount)
for AlarmStatus in (New,OpenAlarm,Working,Escalated,AutoClosed,FalsePositive,Resolved,UnResolved,Reported,Monitor)
) piv

select AlarmMonth, (ISNULL(New,0)+ISNULL(OpenAlarm,0)+ISNULL(Working,0)+ISNULL(Escalated,0)+ISNULL(AutoClosed,0)+ISNULL(FalsePositive,0)+ISNULL(Resolved,0)+ISNULL(UnResolved,0)+ISNULL(Reported,0)+ISNULL(Monitor,0)) as Total,
(ISNULL(AutoClosed,0)+ISNULL(FalsePositive,0)+ISNULL(Resolved,0)+ISNULL(UnResolved,0)+ISNULL(Reported,0)+ISNULL(Monitor,0)) as Closed
from
(
SELECT 
DATENAME(month, AlarmDate) AS AlarmMonth,
COUNT(AlarmName.Name) AS AlarmCount,
(CONVERT(nvarchar, 
CASE 
When AlarmStatus = 0 Then 'New'
When AlarmStatus = 1 Then 'OpenAlarm'
When AlarmStatus = 2 Then 'Working'
When AlarmStatus = 3 Then 'Escalated'
When AlarmStatus = 4 Then 'AutoClosed'
When AlarmStatus = 5 Then 'FalsePositive'
When AlarmStatus = 6 Then 'Resolved'
When AlarmStatus = 7 Then 'UnResolved'
When AlarmStatus = 8 Then 'Reported'
When AlarmStatus = 9 Then 'Monitor' End)) as AlarmStatus
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] as Alarm join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule as AlarmName on Alarm.AlarmRuleID=AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
where
Alarm.AlarmDate BETWEEN getdate()-365 AND getdate()
group by DATENAME(month, AlarmDate),AlarmStatus
) d
pivot
(
sum(AlarmCount)
for AlarmStatus in (New,OpenAlarm,Working,Escalated,AutoClosed,FalsePositive,Resolved,UnResolved,Reported,Monitor)
) piv

select AlarmMonth, (ISNULL(AutoClosed,0)+ISNULL(New,0)+ISNULL(OpenAlarm,0)+ISNULL(Reported,0)+ISNULL(Resolved,0)+ISNULL(FalsePositive,0)+ISNULL(Monitor,0)) as Total,ISNULL(New,0) as New,ISNULL(OpenAlarm,0) as 'Open',ISNULL(Reported,0) as Reported,ISNULL(Resolved,0) as Resolved,ISNULL(FalsePositive,0) as 'False Positive',ISNULL(Monitor,0) as Monitor,ISNULL(AutoClosed, 0 )as 'Auto Closed'
from
(
select DATENAME(month, AlarmDate) AS AlarmMonth,
COUNT(AlarmName.Name) AS AlarmCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case When AlarmStatus = 4 Then 'AutoClosed' When AlarmStatus = 8 Then 'Reported' When AlarmStatus = 6 Then 'Resolved' When AlarmStatus = 5 Then 'FalsePositive' When AlarmStatus = 0 Then 'New' When AlarmStatus = 1 Then 'OpenAlarm' when AlarmStatus = 9 Then 'Monitor' End)) as AlarmStatus
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] as Alarm join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule as AlarmName on Alarm.AlarmRuleID=AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
where
Alarm.AlarmDate BETWEEN getdate()-365 AND getdate()
group by DATENAME(month, AlarmDate),AlarmStatus
) d
pivot
(
sum(AlarmCount)
for AlarmStatus in (New,OpenAlarm,Working,Escalated,AutoClosed,FalsePositive,Resolved,UnResolved,Reported,Monitor)
) piv

SELECT
	msg.Alarm_Priority,
	AVG(amsg.TTD) avgTTD,
	AVG(amsg.TTR) avgTTR,
	COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  (SELECT
	CASE 
		WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'P1'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN 'P2'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 and 79 THEN 'P3'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 and 64 THEN 'P4'
		WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'P5'
	END AS Alarm_Priority,
	MsgID
FROM 
	LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg with (NOLOCK)) msg
	  JOIN
	(SELECT 
		a.DateInserted,
		atm.MARCMsgID,
		a.AlarmID,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn) TTT,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.InvestigatedOn) TTD,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn) TTR
	FROM 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) 
			JOIN 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].AlarmRule ar
		  ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID 
		WHERE 
		  ar.[AlarmType] = 5
		    and
      $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)) amsg
		ON amsg.MARCMsgID = msg.MsgID
GROUP BY
	msg.Alarm_Priority
ORDER BY 
	CASE msg.Alarm_Priority
		WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
		WHEN 'High' THEN 2
		WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
		WHEN 'Low' THEN 4
		WHEN 'Very Low' THEN 5
	END

select b.Technician,b.[Opened Alarms],b.[Closed Alarms],a.[Avg Time to Triage],a.[AVG Time to Close],a.[AVG Time to Investigate],a.[Avg Alarms Risk]
from (select FullName as Technician,avg(DATEDIFF(minute,GeneratedOn,OpenedOn)) as 'Avg Time to Triage', avg(DATEDIFF(minute,GeneratedOn,ClosedOn)) as 'AVG Time to Close', avg(DATEDIFF(minute,GeneratedOn,InvestigatedOn)) as 'AVG Time to Investigate'
,avg(m.Priority) as  'Avg Alarms Risk',count(*) as 'Total'
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].AlarmMetrics
join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] as a on a.AlarmID=AlarmMetrics.AlarmID
join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule on a.AlarmRuleID=AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID
left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] as p on p.PersonID=LastPersonID
left join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmToMARCMsg] as am on a.AlarmID=am.AlarmID
left join [LogRhythm_Events].[dbo].[Msg] as m on am.MARCMsgID=m.MsgID
where  $__timeFilter(AlarmDate) and p.PersonID is not null
group by FullName) as a
full outer join
(select *,isnull("UnAssigned Alarms",0)+isnull("Opened Alarms",0)+isnull("Closed Alarms",0) as "Total"
from
(
select FullName as Technician, (Convert(nvarchar, Case
When AlarmStatus = 0 Then 'UnAssigned Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 1 Then 'Opened Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 2 Then 'Opened Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 3 Then 'Opened Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 4 Then 'Closed Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 5 Then 'Closed Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 6 Then 'Closed Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 7 Then 'Closed Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 8 Then 'Closed Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 9 Then 'Closed Alarms' End)) as AlarmStatus, count(AlarmStatus) as 'Total'
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].AlarmMetrics
join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] as a on a.AlarmID=AlarmMetrics.AlarmID
join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule on a.AlarmRuleID=AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID
left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] on Person.PersonID=LastPersonID
left join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmToMARCMsg] as am on a.AlarmID=am.AlarmID
left join [LogRhythm_Events].[dbo].[Msg] as m on am.MARCMsgID=m.MsgID
where  $__timeFilter(AlarmDate)
group by FullName,AlarmStatus
) d
pivot
(
sum(Total)
for AlarmStatus in ("UnAssigned Alarms","Opened Alarms","Closed Alarms")
) piv) as b on a.Technician=b.Technician
order by a.Technician

SELECT
	msg.Alarm_Priority,
	COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  (SELECT
	CASE 
		WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'P1'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN 'P2'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 and 79 THEN 'P3'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 and 64 THEN 'P4'
		WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'P5'
	END AS Alarm_Priority,
	MsgID
FROM 
	LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg with (NOLOCK)) msg
	  JOIN
	(SELECT 
		a.DateInserted,
		atm.MARCMsgID,
		a.AlarmID,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn) TTT,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.InvestigatedOn) TTD,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn) TTR
	FROM 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) 
			JOIN 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].AlarmRule ar
		  ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID 
		WHERE 
		  ar.[AlarmType] = 5
		    and
      $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)) amsg
		ON amsg.MARCMsgID = msg.MsgID
GROUP BY
	msg.Alarm_Priority
ORDER BY 
	CASE msg.Alarm_Priority
		WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
		WHEN 'High' THEN 2
		WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
		WHEN 'Low' THEN 4
		WHEN 'Very Low' THEN 5
	END

SELECT
   AVG(amsg.TTD) avgTTD,
   AVG(amsg.TTT) avgTTT,
   AVG(CASE WHEN amsg.TTR < 0 THEN 0 ELSE amsg.TTR END) avgTTR,
   COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
(
   SELECT
       CASE
           WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'P1'
           WHEN Priority BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN 'P2'
           WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 and 79 THEN 'P3'
           WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 and 64 THEN 'P4'
           WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'P5'
       END AS Alarm_Priority,
       MsgID
   FROM LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg with (NOLOCK)
) msg
JOIN
(
   SELECT
       a.DateInserted,
       atm.MARCMsgID,
       a.AlarmID,
       DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn) TTT,
       DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.InvestigatedOn) TTD,
       CASE
           WHEN DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn) < 0 THEN 0
           ELSE DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn)
       END AS TTR
   FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
   JOIN LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm with (NOLOCK) ON a.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID
   JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am with (NOLOCK) ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
   JOIN [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].AlarmRule ar ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
   WHERE ar.[AlarmType] = 5
   AND $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)
) amsg ON amsg.MARCMsgID = msg.MsgID
GROUP BY msg.Alarm_Priority
ORDER BY
   CASE msg.Alarm_Priority
       WHEN 'P1' THEN 1
       WHEN 'P2' THEN 2
       WHEN 'P3' THEN 3
       WHEN 'P4' THEN 4
       WHEN 'P5' THEN 5
   END

select b.Technician,a.[Avg Alarms Risk]
from (select FullName as Technician,avg(m.Priority) as  'Avg Alarms Risk'
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].AlarmMetrics
join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] as a on a.AlarmID=AlarmMetrics.AlarmID
join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule on a.AlarmRuleID=AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID
left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] as p on p.PersonID=LastPersonID
left join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmToMARCMsg] as am on a.AlarmID=am.AlarmID
left join [LogRhythm_Events].[dbo].[Msg] as m on am.MARCMsgID=m.MsgID
where  $__timeFilter(AlarmDate) and p.PersonID is not null
group by FullName) as a
full outer join
(select *,isnull("UnAssigned Alarms",0)+isnull("Opened Alarms",0)+isnull("Closed Alarms",0) as "Total"
from
(
select FullName as Technician, (Convert(nvarchar, Case
When AlarmStatus = 0 Then 'UnAssigned Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 1 Then 'Opened Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 2 Then 'Opened Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 3 Then 'Opened Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 4 Then 'Closed Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 5 Then 'Closed Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 6 Then 'Closed Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 7 Then 'Closed Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 8 Then 'Closed Alarms'
When AlarmStatus = 9 Then 'Closed Alarms' End)) as AlarmStatus, count(AlarmStatus) as 'Total'
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].AlarmMetrics
join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] as a on a.AlarmID=AlarmMetrics.AlarmID
join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule on a.AlarmRuleID=AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID
left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] on Person.PersonID=LastPersonID
left join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmToMARCMsg] as am on a.AlarmID=am.AlarmID
left join [LogRhythm_Events].[dbo].[Msg] as m on am.MARCMsgID=m.MsgID
where  $__timeFilter(AlarmDate)
group by FullName,AlarmStatus
) d
pivot
(
sum(Total)
for AlarmStatus in ("UnAssigned Alarms","Opened Alarms","Closed Alarms")
) piv) as b on a.Technician=b.Technician
order by a.Technician

select (Convert(nvarchar, Case
When AlarmStatus = 0 Then 'New'
When AlarmStatus = 1 Then 'OpenAlarm'
When AlarmStatus = 2 Then 'Working'
When AlarmStatus = 3 Then 'Escalated'
When AlarmStatus = 4 Then 'AutoClosed'
When AlarmStatus = 5 Then 'FalsePositive'
When AlarmStatus = 6 Then 'Resolved'
When AlarmStatus = 7 Then 'UnResolved'
When AlarmStatus = 8 Then 'Reported'
When AlarmStatus = 9 Then 'Monitor' End)) as AlarmStatus
, count(AlarmStatus) as 'Count'
from AlarmMetrics
join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] on Alarm.AlarmID=AlarmMetrics.AlarmID
join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule on Alarm.AlarmRuleID=AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID
left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] on Person.PersonID=LastPersonID
where $__timeFilter(Alarm.AlarmDate)
group by AlarmStatus

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
WHERE
  ar.AlarmType = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
WHERE
  ar.AlarmType = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

select FullName,(Convert(nvarchar, Case
When AlarmStatus = 0 Then 'New'
When AlarmStatus = 1 Then 'OpenAlarm'
When AlarmStatus = 2 Then 'Working'
When AlarmStatus = 3 Then 'Escalated'
When AlarmStatus = 4 Then 'AutoClosed'
When AlarmStatus = 5 Then 'FalsePositive'
When AlarmStatus = 6 Then 'Resolved'
When AlarmStatus = 7 Then 'UnResolved'
When AlarmStatus = 8 Then 'Reported'
When AlarmStatus = 9 Then 'Monitor' End)) as AlarmStatus
, count(AlarmStatus) as 'Count'
from AlarmMetrics
join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] on Alarm.AlarmID=AlarmMetrics.AlarmID
join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule on Alarm.AlarmRuleID=AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID
left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] on Person.PersonID=LastPersonID
where $__timeFilter(Alarm.AlarmDate)
group by FullName,AlarmStatus

select Name, (ISNULL(New,0)+ISNULL(OpenAlarm,0)+ISNULL(Working,0)+ISNULL(Escalated,0)+ISNULL(AutoClosed,0)+ISNULL(FalsePositive,0)+ISNULL(Resolved,0)+ISNULL(UnResolved,0)+ISNULL(Reported,0)+ISNULL(Monitor,0)) as Total
from
(
select AlarmName.Name,count(AlarmName.Name) as AlarmCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case
When AlarmStatus = 0 Then 'New' 
When AlarmStatus = 1 Then 'OpenAlarm'
When AlarmStatus = 2 Then 'Working'
When AlarmStatus = 3 Then 'Escalated'
When AlarmStatus = 4 Then 'AutoClosed' 
When AlarmStatus = 5 Then 'FalsePositive' 
When AlarmStatus = 6 Then 'Resolved' 
When AlarmStatus = 7 Then 'UnResolved' 
When AlarmStatus = 8 Then 'Reported' 
When AlarmStatus = 9 Then 'Monitor' End)) as AlarmStatus
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] as Alarm join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule as AlarmName on Alarm.AlarmRuleID=AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
where
 $__timeFilter(Alarm.AlarmDate)
group by AlarmName.Name,AlarmStatus
) d
pivot
(
max(AlarmCount)
for AlarmStatus in (New,OpenAlarm,Working,Escalated,AutoClosed,FalsePositive,Resolved,UnResolved,Reported,Monitor)
) piv

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])

SELECT (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE $__timeFilter([Date Created])

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 0 AND cs.Name = 'Incident'

select * from
 
(
SELECT p.FullName as "Case Owner",count(c.Name) as CaseCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case
When CaseStatusID = 1 Then 'Created'
When CaseStatusID = 2 Then 'Completed'
When CaseStatusID = 3 Then 'Incident'
When CaseStatusID = 4 Then 'Mitigated'
When CaseStatusID = 5 Then 'Resolved' End)) as CaseStatusID
  FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] as c
  left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] as p on p.PersonID=c.PersonID
WHERE  $__timeFilter(c.DateCreated)
group by p.FullName,CaseStatusID
 
) d
pivot
(
sum(CaseCount)
for CaseStatusID in (Created,Completed,Incident,Mitigated,Resolved)
) piv

SELECT
  [Priority],
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,[DateEarliestEvidence],[DateCreated])) avgTTD,
	AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,[DateCreated],[DateClosed])) avgTTR,
  COUNT(*) as Count
 FROM 
	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])
GROUP BY
  [Priority]
ORDER BY
  [Priority] ASC
